divs: Sighting Detailsi went out side because i heard some cats fighting in the front yard. it was about 11:30 p.m i saw a ball of green light toward A-mountain on the west side of town bouncing from left to right very fast as it was doing this it was moving upward and away at a very high rate of speed fast that anything i've ever seen. after a second or two around 5 military helicopter went flying towards the object in the distance from Davis-Monthan Air Force Base. living next to air force base i see all kinds of jets and other aircraft. and this was moving like nothing i've seen before
Summary: a ball of light bounces upward then flys off seconds later helicopters chase after it
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were 2 other sightings in Tucson on or around August 5th 2009
